Linguistics

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
linguistics:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Reto Baumgartner, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Zürich, Switzerland
and
Magdalena Plamada, PhD, Zürich University, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of linguistics, general subclasses, related classes and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about language
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Properties

linguistics:hasCommentLiteral
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a human natural language expression to the literal of a linguistic comment as a textual statement about the expression.
rdfs:domain
language:HumanNaturalLanguageExpression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
linguistics:
rdfs:label
has linguistic comment literal (en)
and
hat linguistischer Kommentarliterale (de)
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
text:hasCommentLiteral

linguistics:Concept

and
hat Sprache (de)
rdfs:range
